EmailTemplate.name: Test Folder.VHM License Email Andrea
EmailTemplate.subject: %first%, Welcome to VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear %first%, Thank you for your interest in VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor (VHM). You're just clicks away from environment enlightenment.
The license key to enable Virtual Health Monitor is in the attached license.txt file. Cut and paste the contents of the file into the wizard form, and you're off to the races. Your Virtual Health Monitor will expire six months from the date of this email and require re-licensing for continued use, but don't worry - we'll keep the renewals coming.
The default login credentials are:
Username: administrator Password: administrator
In good health, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
